description: Data was processed using karyotype nomenclature from the CytoConverterSample table. Chromosomal imbalances and associated genomic coordinates were generated by the CytoConverter software. More details: see https://github.com/isb-cgc/ISB-CGC-CytoConverter/tree/9cc766c5f5f97f417ed0b0d0ed1bb390b1334f8d

fields.description: Clone number as determined by CytoConverter
fields.name: Clone

fields.description: Chromosome number (1- 22, X or Y) in format "chrNum"
fields.name: Chr

fields.description: Start coordinate of the aberration identified by CytoConverter. Based on genome build hg38.
fields.name: Start

fields.description: End coordinate of the aberration identified by CytoConverter. Based on genome build hg38.
fields.name: End

fields.description: Type of copy number aberration as determined by CytoConverter
fields.name: Type
